meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was the trashiest film I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The trashiest clothes are often the cheapest ones at the store.
meanings.sent3: She tried to sell me the trashiest old book, claiming it was a rare find.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house on the corner looked like the trashiest place in town.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the dumpster was the trashiest odor imaginable.

meanings.definition: Characterized by being of low social status or lacking refinement.
meanings.sent1: The gossip magazine always features the trashiest celebrities on its cover.
meanings.sent2: She refused to attend the party because she heard it was the trashiest event of the year.
meanings.sent3: The dog's antics at the park made him the trashiest pet around.
meanings.sent4: The reality TV show depicted the trashiest side of fame and fortune.
meanings.sent5: The behavior of the unruly guests was the trashiest display of manners.
